S.FORM: aicu a pasing (heping gu) na seqaqusa i Taiciu i Taiwan. pulingetj a kadjunangan na Heping gu masan 1,006.12 a kuzulj a mituruturu (maqlinpan atjunang 900.79 a kuzulj a mituru, maqlinaule atjunang 62.11 a kuzulj a mituru). izua malje 6,503 mapuljat imaza, ljakua izua malje 2,544 (59 ) a Tayazuku a caucau i Heping gu. cinalivatan kasipaljavaljavak na dripung ta qinlajan imaza a sihu a na taiciu. ayatua kiqecevan na mihu(qinaljan se tayal) ta dripun tjaivililj, sa sipaljavaljavak na sihu niamadju a tjatjuruvu a keisac i ta matjatjelu a pinaljavakan. na djemaljun a caucau seciuku tamaza kacaviljan a 1945. sipaljavaljavak niamadju a sihu na heping gu na taiciu. izua alu a cun imaza a pinaljavakan. kadjunangan tjaikacedas a heping gu i tu taiciu imaza. pasakacedas ta bsuring (xiulin gu) na kalinku; pasanavalj ta ren'ai gu kata guoxing gu na lamtaw king; pasaviri ta tarien (kaizuan na pazeh, i zhuolan tucu) kata taian na bari (siayaya ta miauli king tucu a kakaian na taokas), ta nahuy (jianshi gu) na hsinchu king; pasakaledep ta xinshe gu kata dongshi gu. izau veljeluan a taokas (dajia ayain tucu) a pasa i ta gadu a pinapungadan na tayal a babo hagai i tjaiviri. caucau paljavak tua qinaljan matja 13 a qinaljan i Heping. Sqoyaw Tabuk Slamaw Lilang M'ihu Tgbin L'olu Kling Pasing Slamaw Tbulan S'yux Hrung pinaljavakan mapuljat izua daitai saka tapuluq saka pitju a lin imaza na pinaljavakan naicu a li a alu. papupaysu tataleman kakiciqavan tatuluan izua tapuluq a gakku a kedrikedri imaza. biuing iyubingkiuku (yuzeng) sasupuan na iyubingkiuku 424 a sasupuan na iyubingkiku se pasing (heping gu). remayurangan sipacacikeljan palidring a djalan sikamasanpitjulj A a palidring a djalan na taiwan: kasimaza a patje yilan sikamasanvalulj a palidring a djalan na taiwan (inika djalan na remayurangan; aicu a djalan na taqaljaqaljan imaza) sikamasan 140 a paladring a djalan na bari (miaoli king) sikamasan 47 a palidring a djalan na taiciu: maqati a kemasi tamaza a patje bari (miaoli king) basu basu na fengyuan i lizuk a taiciu sikamasan 90 sikamasan 153 sikamasan 153 sikamasan 153 sikamasan 207 sikamasan 209 sikamasan 251 sikamasan 252 sikamasan 253 sikamasan 266 sikamasan 266 sikamasan 267 sikamasan 269 sikamasan 821 sikamasan 850 sikamasan 865 sikamasan 865 sikamasan 866 sikamasan 866 ( 1) sikamasan 866 ( 2) sikamasan 866 ( 3) basu na kukang sikamasan 1751 a kemasi ta yilan a patje slamaw sikamasan 1764 a kemasi ta lutung a patje slamaw basu na kalinku sikamasan 1141 a kemasi ta ljaljevavavan na kalinku ta kisiya a patjetaiciu(slamaw) kisiya djalan djamay
